articles.author: Robin Schmidt
articles.description: 0xSplits is an open-source, audited, and non-upgradeable protocol for efficiently splitting onchain income. Whenever a Split receives funds, each recipient gets their share. Simple enough for friends, secure enough for anons.
articles.title: 0xsplits – Power Is Nothing Without Control
